Instance: Who Is Our Ally?
You provided your answer to Sigênik's question about Zidemel. Speak with him again to continue your test.
Tell Sigênik <rgb=#00FF00>yes</rgb>, Zidemel is the elder allied to the rebellion

You provided all of your answers to Sigênik's questions. Speak with him to learn your judgement.
Tell Sigênik <rgb=#00FF00>yes</rgb>, Malgat is the elder allied to the rebellion

'As I said before, one of the Elders allies with our cause, and the other three are not our enemy. I will ask you only a few questions, and your honest answer will prove your value to us.'

He pauses.

'I will begin. Igbâl, the merchant who employs the translator... is he allied with our rebellion?'
Sigênik asked if Nangar is allied with the rebellion
You suggest that Igbâl is the rebellion's ally
Tell Sigênik <rgb=#00FF00>no</rgb>, Zidemel is not the elder allied to the rebellion
Tell Sigênik <rgb=#00FF00>no</rgb>, Nangar is not the elder allied to the rebellion

'Nangar, the keeper of the walls, is he allied with our cause?'
'Malgat, the Elder hunter who stocks the larder and turns a profit from the desert fauna, is he allied with our rebellion?'
'Very good. Let us return.'
'We should return. It is better that Ordâkhai eyes do not see us speaking.'
